titles.title: Blast Pressure Exposure Study Improvement Act
Blast Pressure Exposure Study Improvement Act

A bill to modify the requirements for the longitudinal medical study of the Department of Defense on blast pressure exposure of members of the Armed Forces to assess the feasibility and advisability of uploading and sharing data, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Blast Pressure Exposure Study Improvement Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense, as part of its study on traumatic brain injuries caused by blast pressure exposure, to assess the feasibility and advisability of uploading and sharing study data.
